plugins.name: Big-Tech Style Design Challenges
plugins.description:
✨ Figma Plugin Description

Practice real-world design challenges directly inside Figma.

Sharpen your product thinking and UX skills with guided prompts and exercises — perfect for designers prepping for interviews or just looking to stay sharp.


🌐 What is Designus?

When you submit your solution via the plugin, your work gets published to the Designus platform — where you can explore other designers' answers and learn from diverse approaches.

Use the plugin to focus on solving the challenge, and head to the website to review and reflect on submitted solutions.


🛠 How to Use the Plugin

  1. Launch the plugin
  2. Choose a challenge from the calendar
  3. Click Import to add the challenge & solution frame to your canvas
  4. Design your solution directly inside Figma
  5. Reopen the plugin and go to Export Solution
  6. Select your solution frame and write a short description
  7. Click Export to submit your answer
  8. Go to Designus website to review your submission and check out others' solutions.
plugins.tagline: Design Challenges - Level up your design skills through real design challenges.

131471.name: Big-Tech Style Design Challenges

plugins.name: Pixel Painter for Figma
plugins.description:
✨ What is Pixel Painter?

Bored in Figma? Need a quick brain break between design reviews? Pixel Painter lets you unleash your inner 8-bit artist right inside Figma — one pixel at a time. Think pixel art meets coffee break.


🎮 How It Works

  1. Fire up the plugin, get a random fun drawing challenge (like “Draw a cat in 1 minute” 😺).
  2. Use the color palette to fill a pixel grid — no judgment on your MS Paint skills.
  3. Timer keeps the pressure on — can you beat the clock?
  4. Save your masterpiece as PNG (complete with a cheeky watermark).


🧠 Why It Rocks

  1. 100+ non-repeating prompts keep the creativity flowing
  2. Click-to-color grid, color palette, and timer — like Figma meets Mario Paint
  3. Works inside the plugin popup — no canvas mess
  4. Great for solo play
plugins.tagline: Take a break and draw Pixels.

plugins.name: Console CLI
plugins.description:
Console CLI lets you control Figma using commands. You can list fonts, styles, and components, create shapes, get details about selected elements, check file analytics, and view user info.


Commands:

  1. help : See available commands
  2. ls : Lists data related to fonts, styles, or components
  3. ls fonts : List all fonts used in the file
  4. ls styles : List all styles used in file file
  5. ls components : List all components in the file
  6. shape : Create a new shapes based on the specified type
  7. shape rect <width> <height> [x] [y] : Create rectangle
  8. shape circle <diameter> [x] [y] : Create circle
  9. shape ellipse <width> <height> [x] [y] : Create ellipse
  10. shape polygon <sides> <radius> [x] [y] : Create polygon
  11. shape star <points> <outer-radius> <inner-radius> [x] [y] : Create star
  12. selection : Info about the currently selected nodes
  13. selection --verbose : Additional details about the selection
  14. analytics : Retrieve file analytics
  15. whoami : Retrieves info about the current user
  16. clear : Clear the console
  17. exit : Close the plugin
plugins.tagline: CLI for Figma. List elements, create shapes, get selection info, and check file analytics.

plugins.name: Sierotki Eliminator
plugins.description:
Sierotki Eliminator tackles a common issue in Polish typography known as "sierotki" (literally "orphans"). In Polish texts, single-letter words like "a", "i", "o", "u", "w", or "z" at the end of a line are considered typographic errors.


This plugin automatically replaces the space after these single-letter words with a non-breaking space, ensuring they always stay with the following word. By eliminating "sierotki", it enhances the visual appeal and readability of your Polish text in Figma designs.


Whether you're a Polish designer or working on Polish-language projects, Sierotki Eliminator helps you maintain proper typography.
plugins.tagline: Remove single-letter words at the end of a line

105512.description:

This plugin automatically replaces the space after these single-letter words with a non-breaking space, ensuring they always stay with the following word. By eliminating "sierotki", it enhances the visual appeal and readability of your Polish text in Figma designs.


Whether you're a Polish designer or working on Polish-language projects, Sierotki Eliminator helps you maintain proper typography.
105512.tagline: Remove single-letter words at the end of a line

plugins.name: Find and Replace Screens
plugins.description:
Find and Replace Screens is a tool designed to streamline the process of updating screens in Figma with just one click. Whether you're transitioning from wireframes to final UI designs or updating screens across an entire flow, this plugin saves you time by keeping your layout, connectors, and arrows intact. No more manual re-positioning or reconnecting screens!


Key features:

  1. One-Click screen replacement: Update multiple instances of the same screen with a single action, ideal for projects where the same screen is used in multiple places.
  2. Preserves layout and flow: Replacing a screen won't disturb its surrounding elements, including arrows, connectors, and positions within the flow.
  3. Flexible use case: While perfect for wireframe-to-UI transitions, the plugin is also useful for updating iterations of any design screen without losing structure.


How to Use:

  1. Choose the new screen you want to use (UI design, updated iteration, etc.).
  2. Select the screen(s) you want to replace in the flow.
  3. Click "Replace Screen" to swap the content while maintaining connections and layout positions.


Limitations:

  1. For best results, ensure the new screens are similar in size to the ones being replaced, as large size differences may affect layout alignment.
  2. Does not adjust connectors/arrows if the new screen's size significantly differs from the original.
plugins.tagline: Find and Replace Screens across your project with one click while keeping connections intact.

No more manual re-positioning or reconnecting screens!


Key features:

114360.tagline: Find and Replace Screens across your project with one click while keeping connections intact.

plugins.name: Fontastic
plugins.description:
Find the fonts you can't locate, hidden in unknown or messy files.


Have you ever opened a project only to find you have no idea what fonts were used? With our plugin, you can quickly and easily locate those hidden typefaces that complicate your work. Forget digging through messy files and wasting valuable time—uncover what once seemed impossible with just one click. Make your workflow faster and more efficient! ⚡


  1. 🔎 Have you been handed a file with no clues about its fonts?
  2. ⚡️ Are you looking to save hours of work while reviewing text?
  3. 🤖 Would you like an assistant that reveals hidden fonts in a single click?


Say goodbye to frustration and hello to a smoother creative process! 🎉
plugins.tagline: Find the fonts you can't locate, hidden in unknown files or messy archives.

138535.release_notes:
新增了对figma工具中绘制的多边形的支持(仅支持正多边形，即绘制时边界框宽度高度相同)；

由于算法不同，多边形修改圆角类型后和矩形略有差异，具体表现为，插件会给多边形一个autolayout，同时锁定内部多边形，此时选中autolayout即可修改内部多边形。

Polygon Support: Added support for regular polygons (created with equal width and height).

How it Works: When a polygon's corner style is modified, it will be wrapped in a locked Auto Layout frame. To continue making edits with the plugin, simply select this new Auto Layout frame.
138535.tagline: 提供三种圆角样式 Provide extended corner styles

plugins.name: Variable Calculator
plugins.description:
Easily calculate variable values

Use Variable Calculator to apply math formulas, recalculating your variables. Apply to en entire collection, specific group, or specific mode. Great for scaling numbers for responsive behavior.


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables
  4. Enter the formula to apply to the variables
  5. Calculate!


Tip

  1. Use a, b, c, n, v, x, $ or value to reference the current variable value.
  2. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  3. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  4. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive.
  2. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate.


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Run math operations on your variable values!

plugins.name: Notion Book Cover Formatter
plugins.description:
Notion Book Cover Formatter solves the common problem of adapting vertical book covers (typically in 2:3 ratio) to Notion's responsive format. Instead of struggling with manual resizing and background creation, this plugin automatically:

  1. Positions your book cover perfectly within the Notion image dimensions
  2. Creates a beautiful and consistent background from the original cover


Step by step instructions:

  1. Upload a book cover image
  2. Plugin creates a frame containing the formatted image
  3. Export the frame
  4. Upload to Notion as "Files & Media"
plugins.tagline: Notion-ready book covers with a single image upload

131187.name: Notion Book Cover Formatter
131187.description:
Notion Book Cover Formatter solves the common problem of adapting vertical book covers (typically in 2:3 ratio) to Notion's responsive format. Instead of struggling with manual resizing and background creation, this plugin automatically:

  1. Positions your book cover perfectly within the Notion image dimensions
  2. Creates a beautiful and consistent background from the original cover


Step by step instructions:

  1. Upload a book cover image
  2. Plugin creates a frame containing the formatted image
  3. Export the frame
  4. Upload to Notion as "Files & Media"

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to process image data from local file uploads using the fetch API to create formatted book covers.

131187.tagline: Notion-ready book covers with a single image upload

plugins.name: TDS - Persian Component Configuration Mapping
plugins.description:
Persian Converter for Alt Names

Effortlessly create component mapping for bilingual designers text in components with Persian support!


What it does

This plugin automatically converts Component configurations following "Alt. name:" lines to Persian script while preserving your original content. Perfect for designers working with multilingual interfaces or Persian localization.


Key Features


Smart Conversion

Transliterates English letters → Persian script using Persian-Standard keyboard mappings.

Converts digits → Persian numerals (۰۱۲۳)

Preserves non-Persian symbols/punctuation


Clean Workflow

  1. Purge Existing Persian - Removes all prior Persian characters/numbers from "Alt. name:" lines
  2. Convert - Transforms English characters to Persian equivalents
  3. Append - Adds converted text below original with proper spacing


Ideal For

Persian interface localization

Bilingual design systems

Teams collaborating across Latin/Persian script workflows

Maintaining clean alt-text alternatives in components

Design System Managers


Why Design System Managers will Love It:

No manual copy-pasting between lines

Prevents script mixing errors

Case-insensitive matching ("ALT. NAME:", "alt name :", etc.)

Multi-Format Support (Plain text nodes, Markdown-enabled descriptions)


-----


Coded with AI and ZERO coding knowledge :)
plugins.tagline: Maps component configuration from english keyboard to Standart persian keyboard

plugins.name: Wally Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Looking for an easy way to make your designs accessible without compromising creativity?

Our all-new plugin makes it simple to instantly add accessibility to your designs, allowing you to focus on what matters most—creating outstanding user interfaces that are usable by all.

Automatically detect and resolve a wide range of accessibility issues, eliminating the need for manual compliance checks. With real-time feedback, your designs are accessible from the start, saving you both time and effort.

By prioritizing accessibility from the beginning, you’ll create impactful, user-friendly designs that engage and serve every user. Creating visually compelling, fully inclusive designs has never been easier.
plugins.tagline: Create accessible designs with ease

132999.name: Wally Accessibility Checker

By prioritizing accessibility from the beginning, you’ll create impactful, user-friendly designs that engage and serve every user. Creating visually compelling, fully inclusive designs has never been easier.

plugins.name: ICONCINO - Free icons
plugins.description:
These icons were designed by Gabriele Malaspina and are released under the CC0 1.0 license.


You can use them freely for personal and commercial projects, with no attribution required.


Modify them, remix them, use them in client work or side projects — no strings attached.


All icons are available in a single Figma file to make browsing and copying super easy (using the file you can customize the corner radii).


If you find them useful and want to say thanks, you can buy me a coffee ☕ — totally optional, but always appreciated!

accepted.name: Gabriele Malaspina
accepted.description: Digital product designer ❖ Figma educator ❖ Coordinator of the UI Design Course by Politecnico di Milano ❖ Design systems enthusiast ❖ Accessibility advocate

plugins.tagline: Add icons from the ICONCINO set

plugins.description:
AI Image Generator brings powerful text-to-image capabilities right into Figma. With just a prompt, you can:


Produce photorealistic or stylistic images in seconds


Adjust aspect ratio, style presets, and color palettes


Batch-generate up to 10 assets at once


Keep everything private—processing happens securely within your files


No external tools required: design, iterate, and refine without ever leaving Figma.

plugins.name: DesignFast: AI Design Linter ( Rename Layers...)
plugins.description:
Enhance your Figma designs with AI-powered optimization. Our smart tools streamline your workflow and enhance design quality automatically.


Features:

  1. Smart Layer Renaming: Instantly organize and standardize your layer names for better collaboration and design management.
  2. AutoLayout Conversion (Coming Soon): Automatically transform your designs into responsive AutoLayout components with one click.

Boost your productivity and maintain design consistency with our easy-to-use tools. Focus on creativity while our AI handles the technical details.


Our mission is to enhance productivity and creativity, making high-level design techniques accessible to all and streamlining the creation of enriching visual content.


More Information

plugins.name: RePic
plugins.description:
Smart Bulk Image Replacement for Figma

Boost your design workflow with bulk image replacement. Effortlessly swap images into your Figma projects with just a few clicks—select your target images, pick replacements, and let RePic handle the rest. Perfect for updating mockups, prototypes, or templates, RePic auto-fills extra slots with a transparent placeholder and offers a "delete after replace" option for a clutter-free canvas.


How to Use RePic

  1. Select images (or their frame) to replace.
  2. Select replacement images next.
  3. Click Replace Images—done!

Optional: Check "Delete after use"
plugins.tagline: Lightning-Fast Bulk Image Replacement

127982.name: RePic
127982.description:

How to Use RePic

  3. Click Replace Images—done!

Optional: Check "Delete after use"

plugins.name: AI Real Data Generator
plugins.description:
Description

Testing with real-life data is crucial, but setting up prototypes manually is time-consuming. With AI Real Data Generator Figma plugin, simply provide AI with your instructions and an example—using your Gemini API key, it will instantly generate and replace data in your design, making prototyping seamless and efficient.


How to Use:

  1. Add the AI Real Data Generator plugin in Figma.
  2. Enter your Gemini API key to enable data generation.
  3. Provide instructions on the type of real-life data you need.
  4. Provide an example or data template to guide AI generation.
  5. AI instantly generates and replaces data directly in your Figma design.


Key Features:


  1. Instant data generation: AI quickly fills in real-world data in seconds.
  2. Customizable: Provide specific instructions and examples to match your needs.
  3. Seamless integration: Data replaces existing placeholders in your design automatically.
  4. Efficiency boost: Save time on manual data entry during prototyping.
  5. Powered by Gemini API: Leverage advanced AI for precise data generation, enabled with the free gemini-2.0-flash modal
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma designs with real-world data using AI-powered precision

plugins.name: Convert To Bionic Writing
plugins.description:
Unlock Faster, More Focused Reading with Bionic Reading: This plugin applies the Bionic Reading method (bionic-reading.com) to your text layers, dynamically bolding the initial letters of words to improve reading speed and comprehension. By leveraging the natural fixation points of the eye, Bionic Reading helps readers process text more efficiently with less cognitive effort. This plugin works best with fonts that offer multiple weight variations.


Key Features:


  1. Converts selected text layers to Bionic Reading format.
  2. Optimizes text for faster and more focused reading.
  3. Ideal for improving readability and engagement.



Open Source: github.com/mrayubmuhammad/Convert-To-Bionic-Writing-Figma-Plugin



Created by d3flow (www.d3flow.com) using Claude.ai.

Note: Requires fonts with multiple weight options for optimal performance.

accepted.name: Ayub Muhammad
accepted.description: Cofounder at d3flow where we Design, Develop and Distribute in flow.

accepted.name: d3flow
accepted.description: Design, Develop, Distribute in flow with d3flow

plugins.tagline: Focused Reading, Better Typography

Automate your icon workflow:


  1. Export SVGs from Figma → GitHub

Save time, reduce errors, and streamline collaboration between designers and developers.

plugins.name: Find Components
plugins.description:
このFigmaプラグイン「Find Components」は、選択した複数のレイヤーの中からメインコンポーネント/インスタンスを効率的に選出するのに役立ちます。


主な機能：

  1. メインコンポーネント/インスタンスの絞り込み： 選択したレイヤーの中から、メインコンポーネント/インスタンスのみを抽出して選択できます。
  2. 検索結果をリスト化： 抽出されたコンポーネントが検索結果としてリスト化され、レイヤー名をクリックするとそのレイヤーがクローズアップ表示されます。
  3. コンポーネントを集める： 実行すると選択中のメインコンポーネントがインスタンスに置き換わり、新しいページにメインコンポーネントが移動します。
  4. 選択対象の切り替え：ドロップダウンメニューから、メインコンポーネント/インスタンスのどちらを選択対象とするかを選択できます。
  5. グループ化されたレイヤーにも対応： グループ化されたレイヤーの奥深くにネストされたコンポーネント/インスタンスも探し出して選択できます。
  6. 処理のキャンセル： 実行処理が重い場合でも、途中で処理をキャンセルできます。


このプラグインは、以下のような場面で役立ちます：

  1. デザインシステムの整理： 大量のコンポーネント/インスタンスの中から、特定のものを効率的に見つけたい場合。
  2. デザインの更新： 複数のインスタンスをまとめてメインコンポーネントにリンクさせたい場合。
  3. 共同作業： チームメンバーが作成したコンポーネントやインスタンスを、効率的に把握したい場合。


---


This Figma plugin, "Find Components," helps you efficiently identify main components and instances from multiple selected layers.


Key Features:

  1. Filter Main Components/Instances: Extract and select only the main components or instances from the selected layers.
  2. List Search Results: The extracted components are displayed as a list. Clicking on a layer name will zoom into that specific layer.
  3. Gather Components: When executed, selected main components are replaced with instances, and the main components are moved to a new page.
  4. Toggle Target Type: Choose whether to target main components or instances from a dropdown menu.
  5. Support for Nested Layers: Even components/instances deeply nested within grouped layers can be found and selected.
  6. Cancel Processing: You can cancel the process at any time, even if the operation is heavy.


This plugin is useful in the following scenarios:

  1. Organizing Design Systems: Efficiently find specific components or instances among a large number of them.
  2. Updating Designs: Batch-link multiple instances to their corresponding main components.
  3. Collaborative Work: Quickly identify components or instances created by team members.

accepted.name: Yuji Arai (Romantist inc)
accepted.description:
Romantist Inc. is a small design and production company.
Therefore, we have only a few designers on our staff,
We have a small number of designers, but they hav

plugins.tagline: find components and instances

  2. 検索結果をリスト化： 抽出されたコンポーネントが検索結果としてリスト化され、レイヤー名をクリックするとそのレイヤーがクローズアップ表示されます。
  3. コンポーネントを集める： 実行すると選択中のメインコンポーネントがインスタンスに置き換わり、新しいページにメインコンポーネントが移動します。

  6. 処理のキャンセル： 実行処理が重い場合でも、途中で処理をキャンセルできます。


このプラグインは、以下のような場面で役立ちます：

  3. 共同作業： チームメンバーが作成したコンポーネントやインスタンスを、効率的に把握したい場合。


---


This Figma plugin, "Find Components," helps you efficiently identify main components and instances from multiple selected layers.


Key Features:

  1. Filter Main Components/Instances: Extract and select only the main components or instances from the selected layers.
  2. List Search Results: The extracted components are displayed as a list. Clicking on a layer name will zoom into that specific layer.
  3. Gather Components: When executed, selected main components are replaced with instances, and the main components are moved to a new page.
  4. Toggle Target Type: Choose whether to target main components or instances from a dropdown menu.
  5. Support for Nested Layers: Even components/instances deeply nested within grouped layers can be found and selected.
  6. Cancel Processing: You can cancel the process at any time, even if the operation is heavy.


This plugin is useful in the following scenarios:

  1. Organizing Design Systems: Efficiently find specific components or instances among a large number of them.
  2. Updating Designs: Batch-link multiple instances to their corresponding main components.
  3. Collaborative Work: Quickly identify components or instances created by team members.

- Changed to collect main components on the same page
- Fixed an issue where layer order changed when replacing with an instance

plugins.name: RAO - Compliance Checker
plugins.description:
In a few clicks, checks Figma designs for regulatory compliance across global financial regulators:

  1. FCA (UK 🇬🇧)
  2. ESMA (EU 🇪🇺)
  3. SEC (USA 🇺🇸)
  4. FDIC (USA 🇺🇸)
  5. OCC (USA 🇺🇸)
  6. AMF (FR 🇫🇷)
  7. SEBI (India 🇮🇳)
  8. BaFin (Germany 🇩🇪)
  9. SCA (UAE 🇦🇪)
  10. BCB (Brazil 🇧🇷)
  11. MAS (SG 🇸🇬)
  12. FINMA (Switzerland 🇨🇭)
  13. CNBV (Mexico 🇲🇽)
  14. MFSA (Malta 🇲🇹)
  15. CySEC (Cyprus 🇨🇾)


How to Use

1. Select the Figma frame or element you want to check

2. Choose your target regulator

3. Click "Review Designs"

4. Easy to action compliance recommendations in seconds!


Features

  1. Specific product design feedback
  2. Detailed citation of relevant regulations
plugins.tagline: Global compliance at your fingertips

Easily generate customizable idea squares with beautiful random gradients! Choose the number of squares and the gradient direction (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) directly from the plugin's minimalist interface. plugins.name: Showcase
plugins.description:
Showcase makes presenting specific frames to your team effortless. Whether you’re walking through a design or highlighting a particular frame, Showcase lets you do so directly within the canvas, offering smooth flyover animations for a seamless presentation. Independent of the zoom level, you have full control over how close or far you view your frames—adjust zoom as desired.


Showcase is also helpful when working with large files that contain many frames. If you ever feel lost in the canvas, Showcase helps you quickly focus on a specific frame by simply selecting it from the layers panel.


Showcase is free to use. If you find it helpful, consider supporting the project by buying me a coffee ☕️.

accepted.name: Saleh KAYYALI
accepted.description: Hey 👋🏼  I'm an interaction designer with a passion for nifty productivity tools.

plugins.tagline: Present your Figma frames effortlessly.

104574.name: Showcase
104574.description:
Showcase makes presenting specific frames to your team effortless. Whether you’re walking through a design or highlighting a particular frame, Showcase lets you do so directly within the canvas, offering smooth flyover animations for a seamless presentation. Independent of the zoom level, you have full control over how close or far you view your frames—adjust zoom as desired.


Showcase is also helpful when working with large files that contain many frames. If you ever feel lost in the canvas, Showcase helps you quickly focus on a specific frame by simply selecting it from the layers panel.


Showcase is free to use. If you find it helpful, consider supporting the project by buying me a coffee ☕️.

plugins.name: Death 2 Lorem
plugins.description:
A generative AI Quick Actions plugin:

  1. It just works – no API keys or account needed. Really.
  2. Stay in flow with a lightning fast Quick Actions keyboard UX.
  3. Let it rip with smart prompt templates or write your own.


Tracks:

  1. Generate -> axe the Lorem, never bore 'em
  2. Rewrite -> shred bad copy and make your design sing
  3. Translate -> your design, now on a world tour


What’s coming next:

  1. Moar templates
  2. Multi-select support
  3. Even faster text generation
  4. Maybe a UI. Maybe.


No signup or account needed. No API key needed. Roadie version coming with premium features later – if you want em’. ✌️
plugins.tagline: Lorem is dead. Design faster with real text content.

plugins.name: Button Genie Pro
plugins.description:
Welcome to Button Genie Pro, the Figma plugin that instantly generates a fully featured button component set with every variant, state and Token, so you can focus on design, not tedious setup.


https://geniepro.app/


Quick Start


1. Create a new page in your Figma file where you want to place your button component set.

2. Run the plugin: Search for Button Genie Pro.

3. Follow the two-step UI to create variables and generate buttons.



Create Variables Foundations


On the first screen of the plugin, a single click generates 5 variable collections to lay the foundation of your button system. This makes updating your buttons much more flexible:

00 Primitives

01 Style Tokens

02 Semantic Colors

03 Sizing Tokens

04 Component Tokens

05 Typography



Preview and Generate Button Set


1. Light and Dark Mode: See your Primary, Secondary, and Tertiary buttons side by side in Light and Dark Mode. When you choose your Light or Dark Base Color, Button Genie Pro will automatically define the reverted color. (You can always tweaks colors later in your Figma Variables section).

2. Real-time Contrast Check always make sure your text meets WCAG AA or AAA standards.

3. Customize:

- Button text

- Stroke width for secondary button

- Horizontal/vertical padding, gap, and border radius

- Toggle variants: hover, focus, selected, disabled

- Add icon-only or pill-shaped buttons

4. Create Button Set: Click to generate up to 360 variants (3 types × 5 states × 2 shapes × 3 sizes × 4 content variants), a set of semantic buttons (Success, Warning, Error), and a set of placeholder icons. The base color you choose will be added to your custom color scale (myColor/randomName/50–900) in the Primitives variable collection.



Use Your Button Component


- All generated buttons are grouped into component sets in your document.

- Drag instances onto any frame and override text or icon as needed.

- Variables keep your design tokens flexible: update a token to cascade changes through every button.



Troubleshooting


- If you don't see new components:

  1. Ensure you've correctly generated variables/tokens at the first screen, before generating your button set.
  2. This plugin needs a Figma paid subscription to create Variable Modes. Make sure your have one. If not, the plugin will not work as expected.

- For manual hex input issues, make sure to include a leading `#` and six hex digits.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generates fully featured button component sets with variants & variables (tokens).

plugins.name: 클로드야 번역해줘 얍-🪄
plugins.description:
Claude AI의 강력한 자연어 처리 기능을 활용하여 Figma 디자인의 텍스트를 자연스럽게 번역합니다. 단순한 기계 번역이 아닌, 맥락을 이해하고 자연스러운 번역을 제공합니다.


* Anthropic API 키가 필요합니다 *


주요 기능:

  1. 한국어, 영어, 일본어, 중국어 지원
  2. 앱 UI, 웹사이트, 구어체, 공식문서 등 다양한 번역 스타일
  3. 선택한 텍스트만 번역 또는 전체 페이지 번역
  4. 실시간 번역 진행 상황 및 상세 로그 제공
  5. Anthropic의 Claude AI 기술 활용


사용 방법:

  1. 설정에 Anthropic API 키 입력 및 테스트 > 저장
  2. 번역하고 싶은 레이어 선택
  3. 원본 언어와 번역할 언어 선택
  4. 번역 스타일 선택
  5. '번역하기' 버튼 클릭
plugins.tagline: Claude AI로 Figma 디자인의 텍스트를 자연스럽게 번역하세요.

plugins.name: Copy SVG to Webflow
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you copy an SVG from Figma and paste it directly into your Webflow page.


Options:

  1. Use currentColor for fills
  2. Use currentColor for strokes
  3. Pass custom classes to Webflow (in 'class' attribute)
  4. Set Width and Height to 100%
  5. Set preserveAspectRatio


Enjoy!
plugins.tagline: Copy SVGs from Figma to Webflow with Classes

124623.name: Copy SVG to Webflow
124623.description:
This plugin lets you copy an SVG from Figma and paste it directly into your Webflow page.


Options:

  1. Use currentColor for fills
  2. Use currentColor for strokes
  3. Pass custom classes to Webflow (in 'class' attribute)
  4. Set Width and Height to 100%
  5. Set preserveAspectRatio


Enjoy!
124623.release_notes: Added option to set preserveAspectRatio, changed adding of classes to 'class' attribute to prevent duplicate class names, added the ability to set height and width to 100%
124623.tagline: Copy SVGs from Figma to Webflow with Classes

plugins.name: Text Paster
plugins.description:
What it does

This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select text layers from a selection
  2. Copy text strings from multiple text layers
  3. Paste text strings into multiple text layers in batch
  4. Sort text strings


How to use it

Transfer texts between frame

  1. Select a frame that contain text layers
  2. Click Copy in the plugin
  3. Select another frame that contain text layers you want to transfer the texts to
  4. Click Paste in the plugin


Transfer text from Spreadsheet

  1. Copy text from a spreadsheet (Google Sheets, Excel, etc.) or any line-break-separated text.
  2. Paste it into the text box in plugin
  3. Select a frame that contain text layers you want to paste the texts to
  4. Click Paste in the plugin


Delete hidden layers

  1. Select a frame
  2. Click Select "Hidden layer" (from dropdown menu)
  3. Press Delete key to delete hidden layers


-------

Kudos to AI — This plugin is the result of vibe coding with Cursor and GitHub Copilot. All the features were built just to scratch my own itches.
plugins.tagline: Trasfer text in batch with copy and paste

131151.name: Text Paster
131151.description:
What it does

This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select text layers from a selection
  2. Copy text strings from multiple text layers
  3. Paste text strings into multiple text layers in batch
  4. Sort text strings


How to use it

Transfer texts between frame

  1. Select a frame that contain text layers
  2. Click Copy in the plugin
  3. Select another frame that contain text layers you want to transfer the texts to
  4. Click Paste in the plugin


Transfer text from Spreadsheet

  1. Copy text from a spreadsheet (Google Sheets, Excel, etc.) or any line-break-separated text.
  2. Paste it into the text box in plugin
  3. Select a frame that contain text layers you want to paste the texts to
  4. Click Paste in the plugin


Delete hidden layers

  1. Select a frame
  2. Click Select "Hidden layer" (from dropdown menu)
  3. Press Delete key to delete hidden layers


-------

Kudos to AI — This plugin is the result of vibe coding with Cursor and GitHub Copilot. All the features were built just to scratch my own itches.
131151.release_notes:
- Fixed the issues that Copy and Paste buttons cannot handle directly selected text layers (previously can only select from frames)
- Improve progress bar perceived performance issue by reducing progress bar update frequency. Update progress UI every 1000 layers (previous 100). It sacrifices progress bar accuracy for better peformance
131151.tagline: Trasfer text in batch with copy and paste
